lead_paragraph: Assailants killed an official and a guard before being shot by the police, the authorities said, but advocates for minority Uighurs raised doubts about the account.

headline.main: China Says 5 Killed in Attack at Communist Party Office in Xinjiang

snippet: Assailants killed an official and a guard before being shot by the police, the authorities said, but advocates for minority Uighurs raised doubts about the account....
